archimate:Requirement.name: TM.2.2.4a: a) analysing available information, such as system, network and technical logs; and logs from relevant security products (e.g. malware protection software, Data Leakage Prevention (DLP) and Network-based Intrusion Detection Systems (NIDS))
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
